My birthday

Feb 19, 2013

Today’s my birthday so I’m taking a little break from blogging. I’m a bit down as my wife didn’t give me the pipe making class I asked for REPEATEDLY!! On the more positive side of the ledger many of you have asked what you can give me as a gift. Very thoughtful of you all. If you have a few minutes to spare sign up for Zesta Punta and send me your feedback, positive or negative. Thx, more tomorrow.
